title: Which champion to buy?? JAYCE, DIANA, TALON OR REK'SAI tell me
body:
Hi everyone,
I have some doubts about who to buy, hope you can help me...
Should i buy:
{{champion:126}}, {{champion:131}}, {{champion:91}} or {{champion:421}} 

Please tell me which one should i buy,
Thank you

replies.body: It's a toss up between Diana and Rek'Sai, but I find Diana fun and haven't played Rek'Sai yet.

I wouldn't pick Rek, receiving further nerfs, will fall out soon if not already...

Diana is probably the strongest pick out of the ones mentioned.

If you play a lot of ranked, pick up Rek'sai so that you can FP her for yourself or your teammates.  She is the most "in the meta" champ of the four you have listed currently.

Diana would be my second pick because she is the most versatile of the four, since she can be played in mid, top or jungle, and be built as a tank, assassin, or auto attack bruiser.
